title.rendered: 3 Startup Activities To Apply To At Slush 2023

column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid” column_padding_type=”advanced” gradient_type=”default”][vc_column_text]Slush is a not-for-profit on a mission to create and help founders to change the world. But what exactly does that mean in practice? We’ve created this bite-size piece to introduce you to our favorite Startup Activities taking place during Slush 2023 that you, a founder, should absolutely apply for to make the most out of your Slush experience.[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

Compete For A €1M Investment In The Slush 100 Startup Competition

Join the most coveted startup competition in the world, get a chance to pitch onstage at Slush, and compete for a €1,000,000 investment from the world’s leading early-stage funds: Accel, General Catalyst, Lightspeed, NEA, and Northzone. The top 20 startups will also be getting hands-on mentoring from industry leaders, which makes applying a no-brainer.

Read more here and apply on the Slush Platform by Sep 8.

Showcase Your Startup Onstage At Startup Studio

We have an ambitious goal of seeking the outstanding 2% of early-stage startups from future-defining fields to showcase their startups on stage at Slush 2023. Startup Studio stage offers a one-of-a-kind opportunity to present in front of the 3,000 investors and 300 media representatives attending Slush 2023. Think you have what it takes to be the next unicorn?

Apply to showcase your startup at Startup Studio 2023 here.

Get In Front Of 13,000 Slush-goers At Your Startup Booth

We will be selecting 80 early-stage startups with the most potential to showcase their product at Slush for a full day. Securing a Startup Booth is one of the best places to get traction, leads, and visibility for your company.

Apply here.

For more info about our founder-focused activities, check our Startup page. And hey, we love to hear from you. If you have any questions about Slush for founders, please contact us at startups@slush.org.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_tablet=”inherit” column_padding_phone=”inherit” column_padding_position=”all” column_element_direction_desktop=”default” column_element_spacing=”default” desktop_text_alignment=”default” tablet_text_alignment=”default” phone_text_alignment=”default” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_backdrop_filter=”none” column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” overflow=”visible” gradient_direction=”left_to_right” overlay_strength=”0.3″ width=”1/1″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” animation_type=”default” bg_image_animation=”none” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_tablet=”inherit” column_padding_phone=”inherit” column_padding_position=”all” column_element_direction_desktop=”default” column_element_spacing=”default” desktop_text_alignment=”default” tablet_text_alignment=”default” phone_text_alignment=”default” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_backdrop_filter=”none” column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” overflow=”visible” gradient_direction=”left_to_right” overlay_strength=”0.3″ width=”1/1″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” animation_type=”default” bg_image_animation=”none” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row]
